sn55.8:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā ñātike viharati giñjakāvasathe.
sn55.8:4.3: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn55.8:4.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn55.8:6.1: “Sāḷho, ānanda, bhikkhu kālaṅkato āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
sn55.8:6.2: Nandā, ānanda, bhikkhunī kālaṅkatā pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā opapātikā tattha parinibbāyinī anāvattidhammā tasmā lokā.
sn55.8:6.3: Sudatto, ānanda, upāsako kālaṅkato tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttā sakadāgāmī;
sn55.8:6.4: sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā dukkhassantaṃ karissati.
sn55.8:6.5: Sujātā, ānanda, upāsikā kālaṅkatā tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpannā avinipātadhammā niyatā sambodhiparāyaṇā.
sn55.8:7.1: Anacchariyaṃ kho panetaṃ, ānanda, yaṃ manussabhūto kālaṃ kareyya;
sn55.8:7.2: tasmiṃ tasmiñce maṃ kālaṅkate upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṃ paṭipucchissatha.
sn55.8:7.5: yena samannāgato ariyasāvako ākaṅkhamāno attanāva attānaṃ byākareyya:
sn55.8:7.6: ‘khīṇanirayomhi khīṇatiracchānayoni khīṇapettivisayo khīṇāpāyaduggativinipāto, sotāpannohamasmi avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo’.
sn55.8:8.1: Katamo ca so, ānanda, dhammādāso dhammapariyāyo;
sn55.8:8.2: yena samannāgato ariyasāvako ākaṅkhamāno attanāva attānaṃ byākareyya:
sn55.8:8.3: ‘khīṇanirayomhi khīṇatiracchānayoni khīṇapettivisayo khīṇāpāyaduggativinipāto, sotāpannohamasmi avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo’?
sn55.8:9.1: Idha, ānanda, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.8:9.6: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi … pe …
sn55.8:9.8: Ayaṃ kho so, ānanda, dhammādāso dhammapariyāyo;
sn55.8:9.9: yena samannāgato ariyasāvako ākaṅkhamāno attanāva attānaṃ byākareyya:
sn55.8:9.10: ‘khīṇanirayomhi khīṇatiracchānayoni khīṇapettivisayo khīṇāpāyaduggativinipāto, sotāpannohamasmi avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo’”ti.
